data.name: PrinterDescriptor
desc: describes a printer by specifying the queue name and some settings.
This service may be represented by a com.sun.star.beans.PropertyValue[].

properties.name: CanSetPaperFormat
desc: indicates, whether the printer allows changes to PrinterDescriptor.PaperFormat.

properties.name: CanSetPaperOrientation
desc: indicates, whether the printer allows changes to PrinterDescriptor.PaperOrientation.

properties.name: CanSetPaperSize
desc: indicates if the printer allows changes to PrinterDescriptor.PaperSize.

properties.name: IsBusy
desc: indicates, whether the printer is busy or not.

properties.name: Name
desc: specifies the name of the printer queue to be used.
Which printer queues are available, can be figured out with the system library of the used programming language/environment.

properties.name: PaperFormat
desc: specifies a predefined paper size or if the paper size is a user-defined size.
Setting this property may change the value of PrinterDescriptor.PaperSize.

properties.name: PaperOrientation
desc: specifies the orientation of the paper.

properties.name: PaperSize
desc: specifies the size of the paper in 100th mm.
Setting this property may change the value of PrinterDescriptor.PaperFormat.
